question: My father was diagnosed with CHF few months back. He has Aortic stenosis (AVA-0.8cm2) and is scheduled for AVR surgery. He has EF-56% and also has pulmonary hypertension. He is 64 yrs old has NO hypertension, diabetes, arrythmia or SOB. What is the risk for surgery and what complications if any we can expect.Thank you
title: CHF and AVR surgery
